eventCardDescription: Pridruži nam se na kafi, čaju, limunadi i danu BESPLATNOG rada i
eventDescription:
Otvaramo vrata zajednici: kovorkerima, frilenserima, programerima, gejmerima, projekt menadžerima, umetnicima, dizajnerima i svima dovoljno znatiželjnim da se okušaju u individualnom radu iz zajedničkog prostora.

Prijavi se i svrati do haba poslednjeg petka u mesecu, kada ćeš videti i osetiti prostor (a svi znamo koliko je to važno).

Dođi na ceo dan, pola dana ili samo nekoliko sati - koliko god da je potrebno da postigneš svoj cilj za radni dan.

Probaj da li je ovo radni prostor baš za tebe.

Prijavi se, pojavi se, upoznaj se i pitaj sve što te zanima.

Bićemo spremni sa toplom kafom i toplim odgovorima.❖ SINHRO ponudu za coworking nađi ovde: sinhro.org/coworking

________________________________________________

 

#Funfact - “Coworking u vremeplovu!”

U centru, na korak od starog industrijskog jezgra Pančeva, otvorili smo vrata jedne pančevačke kuće, spomenika kulture iz 1878, koja je samo čekala da joj udahnemo novi život.

Ova jednospratna građevina poseduje i ambijentalne vrednosti u graditeljskom nasleđu Pančeva, i čini sastavni deo zaštićene celine Trga Slobode.

U istoriji, njome koračaju modernista Milan Ćurčin i Branislav Nušić, a sada ona stvara dom otvorenoj zajednici inovatora, preduzetnika, stvaraoca i kreativaca.

Transformacijom iz porodične kuće u community hab dali smo joj novu svrhu, ubacivši nove elemente a ipak zadržavajući tople podsetnike prošlosti. Dođi i poseti naš prostor prožet energijom zajednice koja naziva SINHRO svojim novim domom.

eventCardDescription: THIS STARTUP MENTORSHIP PROGRAM / EVENT WILL BE DELIVERED ONLINE THROUGH VIDEO CONFERENCING. IT'S NOT A WEBINAR.
eventDescription:
THIS STARTUP BUSINESS MENTORSHIP EVENT IS FOR YOU IF:

1. If you are at the IDEA stage and want to know how to convert that idea into a successful startup business

2. If you already have an MVP (Minimum Viable Product) and want to know how to proceed further in order to Validate this MVP & to convert it into the desired product

3. If you already have a Startup Business and want to know the Growth Strategies, Sales & Marketing and how to Scale up in the market

 

 

THE STARTUP EVENT WILL COVER MANY ASPECTS OF A STARTUP BUSINESS INCLUDING THE FOLLOWING:

1. BUILDING A STARTUP BUSINESS:

--- Remember : No Idea is ever too old to break or set records, Market is always ready for your startup business IDEA, if executed properly.

--- Learn : How to execute your idea in order to get the Success in less efforts, little time & less money.

--- Get to know : Whether the idea for your Startup business will work or not and what are the ways to make it work

--- Know whether your startup business will be entitled to "cottage Business"

--- Know the Ecosystem for your startup business

--- Whether to follow or not, the "learn startup" strategies for your startup business

 

2. MARKET RESEARCH & STATISTICS:

--- Understand : Why market research is necessary & how to do it for your startup business

--- Crowdsourcing : How and where to get the required results for your startup business

--- Demographics : Get to know who is going to buy your product and how to make strategies accordingly

 

3. POC / MVP (MINIMUM VIABLE PRODUCT):

--- Get to know : What would be the MVP for your startup business and how to build it for Free

--- Learn : What would be your product or if it will be acceptable by the Market

--- Work & Build : Business Model, Get to know the Early adopters, Iteration methods and How to make "Low hanging fruits" for your startup business

--- Learn : How to get initial traction for your startup business

 

4. PRODUCT & PRODUCT POSITIONING:

--- Remember : Even just a normal artwork, if placed at a Gallery, may fetch million $$

--- Determine : The actual value of your product that customers would love to pay for without any hesitation

--- Get to know : Whether your startup business is suitable for B2B or B2C or for both

--- Learn : Whether "Loss leader pricing" Strategies will work for your Startup business or Not

--- Learn : How to complete and build a good CTA (Call to Action) in your startup business

--- Think & Adopt : The Value proposition (USP's) is what makes your product & startup business different from others

 

5. GO TO MARKET STRATEGY:

--- Remember : A good GTM is to Let the people know what are you selling, event before you have produced it.

--- Build : The best Go To Market (GTM) Strategies for your Startup Business

--- Get : The FMA (First Mover Advantage) for a successful startup business

--- Get to know : Whether Freemium or Gamify will be applied to your products or not and if yes then how

--- Learn : Whether to go for "soft launch" or "Launch party" and how to strategize for "Market Penetration"

 

6. CUSTOMER BEHAVIOR & STRATEGIES:

--- Remember : Customer is Business and without Customers there is nothing to be called as Business

--- Understand : The Customer Behavior Modeling (CBM) & corresponding strategies that will be applicable to your startup business

--- Understand : The market trends for better decision making at it gives a better idea on future of CAR (Customer Acquisition & Retention) to channelize strategies

--- Learn : To build, predict & calculate the CLV based on which MRR/ARR/IRR can be analyzed & predicted for your startup business

--- Understand : The CAC that can be used in correlation with CLV (LTV) for recurring business and its growth.

--- Understand , implement & modify: The NPS (Net Promotor Scale / Score) to understand the Startup Business (Future) Sustainability

--- Get to Know : Whether implementing BANT (for Customer Acquisition) will actually help your business or not & if yes, then how.

--- Get to Know : How to Determine or give a "WoW Factor" to your customers

--- Find & predict : The "laggards" in your startup business

 

7. SALES & MARKETING STRATEGIES:

--- Learn : How to Make the best Sales or Marketing Stregies to sell your product and to get the customers for your startup business

--- Learn : How to optimize the Operational, Analytical & Collaborative CRM's along with CAC

--- Learn : How to analyze the SPC for getting more optimized results in your startup business

--- Get to Know : Why Adertorials, Growth Hacking Strategies, PR's are required to get ROI's with MRR/ARR's in your startup business

 

8. ORGANIZATIONAL STRUCTURE:

--- Remember : Without a proper organizational structure, its hard to implement the strategies & to get what you were looking for

--- Get to Know : How the execute MIS, ERP & EIS for better optimization in your startup business

--- Understand : The internal structure with or without the help of KAM and the KPI's

--- Learn : How to make many evengelists & how to Pivot your startup business

--- Learn : The best strategies to perform SWOT analysis for your Startup Business

 

9. INVESTMENT READINESS (STARTUP FUND RAISING):

--- Understand : Why you are Unable to Raise Funds and you didn't get the reason why Investors are not paying any attention

--- Learn : How to Bootstrap, crowdfund, Equity Crowdfund, OPM's & Sweat Equity for your startup business

--- Get to Know : The Burn rate, Cash flow (positive or negetive), churn rate, IP's (Copyright, Patents, Trademarks) for your startup business

--- Learn : How to build a compelling Pitch deck & Business Plan

--- Get to know: How to build the (initial) traction & get a good Valuation of your Startup Business

 

10. INVESTOR'S ANALYSIS OF A STARTUP (STARTUP FUND RAISING):

--- Remember & learn : Investors ask very basic questions and you need to know what are those & why?

--- Learn : Why investors often stick to "Hockey stick" for a startup

--- Learn & Understand : The Term Sheet & its components that'll affect the startup business & its founder in the future (events).

--- Get to know : How investors think of the Traction & why with just 100 customers you can raise $1million & even with 10,000 customer you can't raise anything

--- Get to know: The valuation (pre & post) of your startup business

 

11. EXIT (STARTUP BUSINESS)

--- Learn : How M&A (Merger & Acquisition) works & how to prepare your startup business for Exit

--- Learn : How to make your startup business safe from "Bubble Burst" and how to use "cliffs" to safeguard your startup business

 

12. COMMON ISSUES WITH STARTUPS:

--- GET TO KNOW : Why your Startup Business is Failing or Not Picking Up, event with multiple efforts and after wasting a lot of time and money

--- Learn : How to overcome the financial, operational, customer problems in your Startup Business

--- Get to know : Why you are unable to get customers in your business or if you are unable to retain the customers for recurring business

--- Learn : What to do when your Startup Business is on the verge of Collapse and you are unable to find a way out-

 

--------------------------------------------------------------------

THIS STARTUP EVENT / PROGRAM WILL ANSWER ALL OF YOUR QUESTIONS WHETHER ITS RELATED TO STARTUP FOUNDATION, MVP (MINIMUM VIABLE PRODUCT), FUND RAISING FOR STARTUP, CUSTOMER ACQUISITION, SALES & MARKETING. THIS STARTUP EVENT IS SUFFICIENT FOR ANYTHING YOU NEED TO KNOW.

eventCardDescription: Blockchain Smart Solutions offers an express 2-hours webinar on Blockchain technology.
eventDescription:
Blockchain Smart Solutions offers an express 2-hours webinar on Blockchain technology.

The workshop presents you with an opportunity to unravel the mysteries of blockchain technology. We aim to empower you with the knowledge and understanding of this growing and revolutionary technology, and support you to kick start your career/business in this space.

Learning Objectives:

  • Understand the basics about blockchain technology.
  • Discover Use Cases applied to various industries.
  • Learn about public & private blockchain networks, what role do they play.
  • Explore few real-world projects.

Agenda:

  • Blockchain Fundamentals (15min)
  • Features of blockchain technology (15min)
  • Key Industry Use Cases (15min)
  • Types of Blockchain - Public vs Private (15min)
  • Public Blockchain applications (15min)
  • Private Blockchain - Hyperledger Fabric (15min)
  • Real World projects (15min)
  • Q&A (15min)

Prerequisite:

No prior knowledge of blockchain is required.

Who can participate:

  • CxO, Technology Managers & Subject Matter Experts from IT/Cyber security, Digital transformation, IoT.
  • Business owners from supply chain, finance, legal & procurement.

By the end of this course, you will have:

  • Sound understanding of various aspects of this growing technology.
  • Ability to make informed decisions about strategic business roadmap for your company.
  • Certificate of attainment.

Note:

  • Subject to Terms & Conditions. Individual pricing only, for corporates, please contact us via our website or drop an email at contact@blocksmartsol.com.
  • If you want to pay via your debit/credit card, you can click here to view the training page on our website, scroll down and click on the "Europe & UK", select the number of tickets you want to purchase, and proceed.
  • If you are still looking for alternate payment options, please contact us via our website or drop an email at contact@blocksmartsol.com.

FAQs

What can I bring into the event?

A curious mind. :)

How can I contact the organiser with any questions?

You can contact us via our website or drop an email at contact@blocksmartsol.com

Will I get any certificate for attending this workshop?

Yes. You will receive a certificate of participation from Blockchain Smart Solutions.

Is there any group discount?

Yes. Please reach out via our website or drop an email at contact@blocksmartsol.com

What's the refund policy?

Upto 2 weeks before the event. Please contact us in case you need to make any changes.

Do I have to bring my printed ticket to the event?

No need. It is a webinar and all you would need is a working computer and internet connection.

Is my registration fee or ticket transferrable?

Yes. Please let us know up until 48 hours before the event.

Is it ok if the name on my ticket or registration doesn't match the person who attends?

Yes. Please let us know up until 48 hours before the event.

eventCardDescription: Tune into these conversations about shifting your mindset, becoming the best version of yourself & game planning. We got you, sis!
eventDescription:
2020 Ain't Cancelled!

Join us on Zoom every Monday @ 5-6 pm PST for conversations about shifting your mindset, becoming the best version of yourself, & game planning during any season.

July Series:

July 6: Becoming Our Own Allies . Celebration of self advocacy and community allyship.

July 13: New Business Babes. Hear from a panel of Black women who started businesses during the pandemic.

July 20: Buy Black the Block. Learn about the power of financial literacy, real estate, investments and Black businesses and how we can support each other and own the block.

July 27: Black on the Ballot. Join the discussion about our voting power as Black women and its importance in the upcoming election.

To receive your Zoom link: You can click the link to "ONLINE EVENT" immediately post-sale. You will also see "Links for this event are available online" and a button that reads "View now" in your order confirmation email, and in a reminder email before the event starts.

We got you, sis +sis allies!
